title: Artificial Intelligence in Energy Market is expected to reach US$ 134.25 billion by 2032 | Major players - ABB, Alphabet, General Electric, IBM, Siemens.

title: Why SA needs locally representative datasets to train diagnostic AI
description: Accurate, fair diagnostic AI can help clinicians make faster, better-informed decisions and reduce unnecessary costs.

title: DeekSeek Launches Two New AI Models, Is It A Threat Call For Gemini And ChatGPT?
description: DeepSeek, a Chinese AI platform, has launched two new models, DeepSeek V3.2 and V3.2 Speciale, aiming to compete with ChatGPT and Gemini. The V3.2 models adopt a reasoning-first approach and claim capabilities comparable to GPT 5 in general tasks.

title: 'AI is evolving fast, but the core truth hasn't changed'

title: From Google and Microsoft to Apple: Amar Subramanya takes charge of AI push
description: Apple has hired Amar Subramanya, a former Google and Microsoft AI leader, as its new vice president of artificial intelligence to accelerate its Siri overhaul and strengthen its AI capabilities amid fierce competition in Silicon Valley.
